name: Bulbasaur

evolution.description: Bulbasaur can evolve into Ivysaur at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 6 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Seed Pokémon. It can go for days without eating a single morsel. In the bulb on its back, it stores energy.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s speed is doubled in harsh sunlight.
